Package org.springframework.cloud.skipper.shell.command.support

Supporting command classes for the Spring Cloud Skipper Shell.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConsoleUserInput
    Interact with the user via the JLine terminal.
    InitializeConnectionApplicationRunner
    An ApplicationRunner implementation that initialises the connection to the Data Flow Server.
    InteractiveModeApplicationRunner
    An ApplicationRunner implementation that determines if the shell should execute in interactive mode or in a 'stand alone executable' mode.
    ShellUtils
    Various utility functions for a skipper shell.
    SkipperClientUpdatedEvent  
    TableUtils  
    Target
    Encapsulates various data points related to the Data Flow Server Target, such as target URI, success/error state, exception messages that may have occurred.
    TargetCredentials
    Encapsulates the credentials to the Skipper Server Target, such as TargetCredentials.username and TargetCredentials.password.
    TargetHolder
    A singleton object that can be passed around while changing the target instance.
    YmlUtils
    Utility for converting a String of comma delimited property values to YAML.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DeploymentStateDisplay
    Provides a typed enumeration of deployment statuses for a collection of applications.
    Target.TargetStatus  

Package org.springframework.cloud.skipper.shell.command.support Description

Supporting command classes for the Spring Cloud Skipper Shell.
